title: May I ask what's your attitude toward ranked game?
body:
Personally, I play ranked game for a laugh...don't judge me  :P that's how I roll.

What's your attitude toward rank games? I am curious  :D vote please 

(There seems to be a maximum number of text I can type in the choices, so excuse my wording)

Seriously, if you can't take a joke, stay away from ranked :)

replies.body:
I am semi- serious

I play to improve, but i really dont give a %%%% of i lose or win. (once i had 2v5, i laughed at my elo)
I also find ranked more balanced and more fun than normals.
worst gamemode in LoL. desevres to have it and any 1 who plays thrown onto a desert and forgotten

When you're low elo, all you have to do is play for a laugh. Because bad decisions and bad plays are being made left, right, and centre. Then when someone actually gets upset over a video game, you laugh even more.
Eh I'm not in low Elo and I mainly play for the lulz anyway. Also you don't even seem to play ranked so you can't really comment on it. Your normal game Elo is low.
